content: EGOL from SEOChat Blows Minds SEO Events By: Rand Fishkin October 31, 2004 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin October 31, 2004 EGOL from SEOChat Blows Minds SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. In two excellent posts in reply to an old theory about a conspiracy surrounding Google's toolbar, EGOL points out the value of SEO money being spent on internally developed content and then goes on to say: Someday, google will rank a site mainly, if not entirely, by its content. You can bull**** people with links but content is the only measure of true value. Brilliant stuff... Read the full post - Toolbar >> Center of Conspiracy Theory?? Copied! Back to Top
